EngineeringSubHeader1Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to engineering projects by any reason other than the specifically excluded in the policy.
EngineeringSubHeader1Point1: Additional Coverage (to be added upon request):
EngineeringSubHeader1Point2Item1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
EngineeringSubHeader2Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to engineering erection projects by any reason other than the specifically excluded in the policy.
EngineeringSubHeader2Point1: Additional Coverage (to be added upon request):

EngineeringSubHeader3Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to electronic equipment by any reason other than the specifically excluded in the policy
EngineeringSubHeader3Point1: Additional Coverage (to be added upon request):
EngineeringSubHeader3Point1Item1: Compensation for physical damage to the data stored within the external data media
EngineeringSubHeader3Point1Item2: Covering additional expenses incurred for the use of alternative data processing equipment
EngineeringSubHeader3Point2Item1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
EngineeringSubHeader4Desc1: Policy covers material damage and third party liability by the sudden and unforeseen damage to the boilers in high pressure operation.
EngineeringSubHeader4Point1: Additional Coverage (to be added upon request):
EngineeringSubHeader4Point2Item1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
EngineeringSubHeader5Desc1: Policy covers financial losses and damages due to sudden mechanical breakdown that the machines are exposed to while working.

EngineeringSubHeader6Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to contractor’s equipment by any reason other than the specifically excluded in the policy.

EngineeringSubHeader7Desc1: Policy covers the sudden and unexpected losses resulting from the deterioration of stored goods due to failure of machinery such as refrigeration machines and other stock preservation devices
